verses.verse: Whoso loveth<WH157> correction<WH4148> loveth<WH157> knowledge<WH1847>; But he that hateth<WH8130> reproof<WH8433> is brutish<WH1198>.
A good<WH2896> man shall obtain<WH6329> favor<WH7522> of Jehovah<WH3068>; But a man<WH376> of wicked devices<WH4209> will he condemn<WH7561>.
A man<WH120> shall not be established<WH3559> by wickedness<WH7562>; But the root<WH8328> of the righteous<WH6662> shall not be moved<WH4131>.
A worthy<WH2428> woman<WH802> is the crown<WH5850> of her husband<WH1167>; But she that maketh ashamed<WH954> is as rottenness<WH7538> in his bones<WH6106>.
The thoughts<WH4284> of the righteous<WH6662> are just<WH4941>; But the counsels<WH8458> of the wicked<WH7563> are deceit<WH4820>.
The words<WH1697> of the wicked<WH7563> are of lying in wait<WH693> for blood<WH1818>; But the mouth<WH6310> of the upright<WH3477> shall deliver them<WH5337>.
The wicked<WH7563> are overthrown<WH2015>, and are not<WH1004>; But the house of the righteous<WH6662> shall stand<WH5975>.
A man<WH376> shall be commended<WH1984> according<WH6310> to his wisdom<WH7922>; But he that is of a perverse<WH5753> heart<WH3820> shall be despised<WH937>.
Better <WH2896> is he that is lightly esteemed<WH7034>, and hath a servant<WH5650>, Than he that honoreth<WH3513> himself<WH2638>, and lacketh bread<WH3899>.
A righteous<WH6662> man regardeth<WH3045> the life<WH5315> of his beast<WH929>; But the tender mercies<WH7356> of the wicked<WH7563> are cruel<WH394>.
He that tilleth<WH5647> his land<WH127> shall have plenty<WH7646> of bread<WH3899>; But he that followeth<WH7291> after vain<WH7386> persons is void<WH2638> of understanding<WH3820>.
The wicked<WH7563> desireth<WH2530> the net<WH4685> of evil<WH7451> men<WH8328>; But the root of the righteous<WH6662> yieldeth fruit<WH5414>.
In the transgression<WH6588> of the lips<WH8193> is a snare<WH4170> to the evil<WH6869> man<WH6662>; But the righteous shall come out<WH3318> of trouble<WH6869>.
A man<WH376> shall be satisfied<WH7646> with good<WH2896> by the fruit<WH6529> of his mouth<WH6310>; And the doings<WH1576> of a man<WH120>'s hands<WH3027> shall be rendered unto him<WH7725>.
The way<WH1870> of a fool<WH191> is right<WH3477> in his own eyes<WH5869>; But he that is wise<WH2450> hearkeneth<WH8085> unto counsel<WH6098>.
A fool<WH191>'s vexation<WH3708> is presently<WH3117> known<WH3045>; But a prudent<WH6175> man concealeth<WH3680> shame<WH7036>.
He that uttereth<WH6315> truth<WH530> showeth forth<WH5046> righteousness<WH6664>; But a false<WH8267> witness<WH5707>, deceit<WH4820>.
There is<WH3426> that speaketh<WH981> rashly like the piercings<WH4094> of a sword<WH2719>; But the tongue<WH3956> of the wise<WH2450> is health<WH4832>.
The lip<WH8193> of truth<WH571> shall be established<WH3559> for ever<WH5703>; But a lying<WH8267> tongue<WH3956> is but for a moment<WH7280>.
Deceit <WH4820> is in the heart<WH3820> of them that devise<WH2790> evil<WH7451>; But to the counsellors<WH3289> of peace<WH7965> is joy<WH8057>.
There shall no mischief<WH205> happen<WH579> to the righteous<WH6662>; But the wicked<WH7563> shall be filled<WH4390> with evil<WH7451>.
Lying <WH8267> lips<WH8193> are an abomination<WH8441> to Jehovah<WH3068>; But they that deal<WH6213> truly<WH530> are his delight<WH7522>.
A prudent<WH6175> man<WH120> concealeth<WH3680> knowledge<WH1847>; But the heart<WH3820> of fools<WH3684> proclaimeth<WH7121> foolishness<WH200>.
The hand<WH3027> of the diligent<WH2742> shall bear rule<WH4910>; But the slothful<WH7423> shall be put under taskwork<WH4522>.
Heaviness <WH1674> in the heart<WH3820> of a man<WH376> maketh it stoop<WH7812>; But a good<WH2896> word<WH1697> maketh it glad<WH8055>.
The righteous<WH6662> is a guide<WH8446> to his neighbor<WH7453>; But the way<WH1870> of the wicked<WH7563> causeth them to err<WH8582>.
The slothful<WH7423> man roasteth<WH2760> not that which he took in hunting<WH6718>; But the precious<WH3368> substance<WH1952> of men<WH120> is to the diligent<WH2742>.
In the way<WH734> of righteousness<WH6666> is life<WH2416>; And in the pathway<WH5410> thereof there is no death<WH4194>.
